summary:
### October 2025 Summary for scaffold-eth/se-2-challenges

- **Major Features/Improvements:**
  - Merged PR #376 introduced a challenge for zk voting, enhancing the functionality of the grader.
  - Merged PR #372 updated the grader action, likely improving its performance or reliability.

- **Bug Fixes:**
  - Merged PR #375 fixed the `create-eth` route and corrected a typo in the documentation.
  - Merged PR #368 disabled AI in cursor and VSCode to improve user experience.

- **Overall Themes:**
  - The focus was on enhancing the grading system and fixing minor issues, indicating ongoing maintenance and improvement efforts.
  - One open issue (#373) regarding challenge titles on Telegram images remains unresolved.

topIssues.title: SRE Telegram group images do not have challenge titles

topPRs.title: fix: additional condition to prevent overflow
Disable ai in cursor and vscode
